item.title: Nim Day 1 Procs
item.description: I decided to learn Nim again, as I’m growing tired with the language I’m currently using at work. I’ll post my notes on what I’ve learned here in my blog just as I would have back then when I studied at school. I’m skipping datatypes section, since it’s pretty straightforward similar to other imperative compiled languages out there (Read more about Basic Datatypes) Also, this language syntax is similar to python.
